what: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
text: goal CAOP.RAA.2024 provide official administrative boundaries Azores (Região Autónoma dos Açores (RAA)) defined 2024 edition Carta Administrativa Oficial de Portugal (CAOP), published Direção-Geral Território (DGT). package includes convenience functions import boundaries ‘sf’ objects spatial analysis R.

title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("patterninstitute/CAOP.RAA.2024")

title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
text: Boundary data provided districts (islands), municipalities civil parishes. Original source data coordinates projected UTM 25N western group islands UTM 26N central eastern groups. projections offer accurate planar representation. Use functions want use projections: parishes_25N() parishes_26N() municipalities_25N() municipalities_26N() districts_25N() districts_26N() Although functions offer accurate projection, can’t combined one single sf object, requires CRS features. Alternatively, also offer transformations EPSG:3035 (ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe) EPSG:4326 (WGS 84) permit islands data one single sf object. data, use functions: parishes("3035") parishes_26N("4326") municipalities("3035") municipalities("4326") districts("3035") districts("4326")

title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
text: Districts (islands):  Municipalities:  Parishes São Miguel island:
code: library(CAOP.RAA.2024) library(ggplot2)  # districts() defaults to districts("3035"). (districts <- districts()) #> Simple feature collection with 9 features and 6 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -281288.2 ymin: -170294.3 xmax: 266022.8 ymax: 140634.8 #> Projected CRS: +proj=laea +lat_0=38.5 +lon_0=-28 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs #>   id            district     area perimeter n_municipalities n_parishes #> 1 48     Ilha das Flores 14096.22        72                2         11 #> 2 49       Ilha do Corvo  1711.45        21                1          1 #> 3 41 Ilha de Santa Maria  9688.74        78                1          5 #> 4 42  Ilha de São Miguel 74457.50       230                6         64 #> 5 43       Ilha Terceira 40026.72       126                2         30 #> 6 44    Ilha da Graciosa  6065.78        44                1          4 #> 7 45   Ilha de São Jorge 24364.78       139                2         11 #> 8 46        Ilha do Pico 44479.53       153                3         17 #> 9 47       Ilha do Faial 17305.53        80                1         13 #>                         geometry #> 1 MULTIPOLYGON (((-278363.3 1... #> 2 MULTIPOLYGON (((-267155.3 1... #> 3 MULTIPOLYGON (((262934.5 -1... #> 4 MULTIPOLYGON (((225499.7 -8... #> 5 MULTIPOLYGON (((67086.26 17... #> 6 MULTIPOLYGON (((4441.145 57... #> 7 MULTIPOLYGON (((16402.23 86... #> 8 MULTIPOLYGON (((-10785.79 -... #> 9 MULTIPOLYGON (((-57167.91 2... ggplot(mapping = aes(fill = district)) +   geom_sf(data = districts, col = "white") +   guides(fill = "none") # municipalities() defaults to municipalities("3035"). (mun <- municipalities()) #> Simple feature collection with 19 features and 6 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -281288.2 ymin: -170294.3 xmax: 266022.8 ymax: 140634.8 #> Projected CRS: +proj=laea +lat_0=38.5 +lon_0=-28 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs #> First 10 features: #>      id          municipality            district     area perimeter n_parishes #> 1  4801      Lajes das Flores     Ilha das Flores  7004.79        51          7 #> 2  4802 Santa Cruz das Flores     Ilha das Flores  7091.44        52          4 #> 3  4901                 Corvo       Ilha do Corvo  1711.45        21          1 #> 4  4101         Vila do Porto Ilha de Santa Maria  9688.74        78          5 #> 5  4201                 Lagoa  Ilha de São Miguel  4559.32        45          5 #> 6  4202              Nordeste  Ilha de São Miguel 10146.80        53          9 #> 7  4203         Ponta Delgada  Ilha de São Miguel 23298.65       102         24 #> 8  4204              Povoação  Ilha de São Miguel 10640.77        64          6 #> 9  4205        Ribeira Grande  Ilha de São Miguel 18015.13       120         14 #> 10 4206  Vila Franca do Campo  Ilha de São Miguel  7796.82        58          6 #>                          geometry #> 1  MULTIPOLYGON (((-278354.8 1... #> 2  MULTIPOLYGON (((-270941.6 1... #> 3  MULTIPOLYGON (((-267155.3 1... #> 4  MULTIPOLYGON (((262934.5 -1... #> 5  MULTIPOLYGON (((221802.1 -8... #> 6  MULTIPOLYGON (((251756.7 -7... #> 7  MULTIPOLYGON (((202982.7 -8... #> 8  MULTIPOLYGON (((234835.9 -8... #> 9  MULTIPOLYGON (((219803.1 -7... #> 10 MULTIPOLYGON (((225482.7 -8... ggplot(mapping = aes(fill = municipality)) +   geom_sf(data = mun, col = "white") +   guides(fill = "none") # parishes() defaults to parishes("3035"). title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
code: # LAEA custom projection ggplot() + geom_sf(data = eez(), fill = NA, linewidth = 1, col = "gray") + geom_sf(data = districts(), mapping = aes(fill = district), col = "white") + guides(fill = "none") # WGS 84 projection ggplot() + geom_sf(data = eez(crs = "EPSG:4326"), fill = NA, linewidth = 1, col = "gray") + geom_sf(data = districts(crs = "EPSG:4326"), mapping = aes(fill = district), col = "white") + guides(fill = "none")

title: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024)
text: Carta Administrativa Oficial de Portugal GitHub CAOP

what: CAOP.RAA.2024: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024) — CAOP.RAA.2024-package
title: CAOP.RAA.2024: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024) — CAOP.RAA.2024-package
text: Provides official administrative boundaries Azores (Região Autónoma dos Açores (RAA)) defined 2024 edition Carta Administrativa Oficial de Portugal (CAOP), published Direção-Geral Território (DGT). package includes convenience functions import boundaries 'sf' objects spatial analysis R. Source: https://geo2.dgterritorio.gov.pt/caop/CAOP_RAA_2024-gpkg.zip.

title: CAOP.RAA.2024: Official Administrative Map of the Azores (CAOP 2024) — CAOP.RAA.2024-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) contributors: Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder]

title: Azorean boundary segments — boundary_segments
text: boundary_segments() returns boundary segments separate administrative entities borders Atlantic Ocean Azores. boundary_segments_25N() returns boundary segments meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 25N, .e. boundary segments western-part archipelago: Ilha das Flores Ilha Corvo. boundary_segments_26N() returns boundary segments meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 26N, .e. boundary segments Central Eastern groups archipelago.

title: Azorean boundary segments — boundary_segments
code: boundary_segments(crs = laea_azores_proj())  boundary_segments_25N()  boundary_segments_26N()

title: Azorean boundary segments — boundary_segments
text: crs Coordinate reference system (CRS) passed st_transform(). Defaults custom CRS centered Azores, see laea_azores_proj() details. possible options "EPSG: 3035" ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe "EPSG:4326" WGS 84.

title: Azorean boundary segments — boundary_segments
text: simple features (sf) object seven fields: id unique UUID identifier segment. id_at_right Identifier entity right side boundary. id_at_left Identifier entity left side boundary. is_confirmed Boundary segment whose acceptance parties yet officially communicated. boundary_type Boundary type: land coast. boundary_level Boundary level: administrative level. length Boundary segment length kilometers.

title: Azorean districts — districts
text: districts() returns boundaries districts (islands) Azores. districts_25N() returns districts meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 25N, .e. districts western-part archipelago: Ilha das Flores Ilha Corvo. districts_26N() returns districts meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 26N, .e. districts Central Eastern groups archipelago.

title: Azorean districts — districts
code: districts(crs = laea_azores_proj())  districts_25N()  districts_26N()

title: Azorean districts — districts
text: crs Coordinate reference system (CRS) passed st_transform(). Defaults custom CRS centered Azores, see laea_azores_proj() details. possible options "EPSG: 3035" ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe "EPSG:4326" WGS 84.

title: Azorean districts — districts
text: simple features (sf) object six fields: id unique identifier district. Follows format [DT][MN][FR]: DT two-digit id district, MN municipality FR district (freguesia Portuguese). district Name civil district. municipality Name municipality. district Name district, coincides name island. area District area hectares (ha). perimeter District perimeter kilometers. n_municipalities Number municipalities district. n_parishes Number parishes district.

what: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
text: function calculates Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) boundary Azores buffering island specified distance (default 200 nautical miles) merging resulting buffers create single EEZ polygon.

title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
code: eez(crs = laea_azores_proj(), distance = 200)

title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
text: crs Character CRS object. target coordinate reference system (CRS) EEZ output. Defaults laea_azores_proj() (custom Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area projection centered Azores). distance Numeric. buffer distance nautical miles (NM) around island. Defaults 200 (200 NM, standard EEZ definition). another value provided, converted meters.

title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
text: sf object representing EEZ single POLYGON.

title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
text: EEZ defined area 200 nautical miles nearest baseline island. function: Buffers island distance × 1,852 meters (default: 370,400 meters). Merges overlapping buffers single EEZ boundary. Transforms final EEZ specified crs.

title: Compute the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) for the Azores — eez
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot() + geom_sf(data = eez(), fill = NA, linewidth = 1, col = "gray") +  geom_sf(data = districts(), mapping = aes(fill = district), col = "white") +  guides(fill = "none")   # WGS 84 projection ggplot() + geom_sf(data = eez(crs = "EPSG:4326"), fill = NA, linewidth = 1, col = "gray") +  geom_sf(data = districts(crs = "EPSG:4326"), mapping = aes(fill = district), col = "white") +  guides(fill = "none")

title: Azorean islands — islands
text: brief dataset nine Azorean islands.

title: Azorean islands — islands
code: islands()

title: Azorean islands — islands
text: tibble columns: group Island group. is_triangle Due proximity, Pico, Faial São Jorge form -called Triangle Central Group islands. name Island's name.

title: Azorean islands — islands
code: islands() #> # A tibble: 9 × 3 #>   group   is_triangle name                #>   <chr>   <lgl>       <chr>               #> 1 Eastern FALSE       Ilha de Santa Maria #> 2 Eastern FALSE       Ilha de São Miguel  #> 3 Central TRUE        Ilha do Pico        #> 4 Central TRUE        Ilha do Faial       #> 5 Central TRUE        Ilha de São Jorge   #> 6 Central FALSE       Ilha Terceira       #> 7 Central FALSE       Ilha Graciosa       #> 8 Western FALSE       Ilha das Flores     #> 9 Western FALSE       Ilha do Corvo

what: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
title: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
text: laea_azores_proj() creates PROJ string custom Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection, centered Azores. allows flexibility setting latitude longitude center, datum, units.

title: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
code: laea_azores_proj(lat_0 = 38.5, lon_0 = -28, datum = "WGS84", units = "m")

title: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
text: lat_0 Numeric. Latitude projection's center. Defaults 38.5 (Central Azores). lon_0 Numeric. Longitude projection's center. Defaults -28 (Central Azores). datum Character. geodetic datum used projection. Defaults "WGS84". options include "ETRS89", "NAD83", etc. units Character. Measurement units projection. Defaults "m" (meters). Can set "ft" (feet) needed.

title: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
text: character string representing PROJ definition custom LAEA projection.

title: Lambert Azimuthal Equal-Area (LAEA) projection centered on the Azores — laea_azores_proj
code: # Default Azores-centered LAEA projection laea_azores_proj() #> +proj=laea +lat_0=38.5 +lon_0=-28 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs  # Custom projection centered at a different location laea_azores_proj(lat_0 = 38, lon_0 = -27, datum = "ETRS89") #> +proj=laea +lat_0=38 +lon_0=-27 +datum=ETRS89 +units=m +no_defs

title: Azorean municipalities — municipalities
text: municipalities() returns boundaries municipalities Azores. municipalities_25N() returns municipalities meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 25N, .e. municipalities western-part archipelago: Ilha das Flores Ilha Corvo. municipalities_26N() returns municipalities meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 26N, .e. municipalities Central Eastern groups archipelago.

title: Azorean municipalities — municipalities
code: municipalities(crs = laea_azores_proj())  municipalities_25N()  municipalities_26N()

title: Azorean municipalities — municipalities
text: crs Coordinate reference system (CRS) passed st_transform(). Defaults custom CRS centered Azores, see laea_azores_proj() details. possible options "EPSG: 3035" ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe "EPSG:4326" WGS 84.

title: Azorean municipalities — municipalities
text: simple features (sf) object six fields: id unique identifier municipality. Follows format [DT][MN]: DT two-digit id district MN municipality. municipality Name municipality. district Name district, coincides name island. area Municipality area hectares (ha). perimeter Municipality perimeter kilometers. n_parishes Number parishes municipality.

title: Azorean NUTS — nuts
text: nuts() returns boundaries Nomenclature Territorial Units Statistics (NUTS). nuts_25N() returns NUTS boundaries meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 25N, .e. NUTS area western-part archipelago: Ilha das Flores Ilha Corvo. nuts_26N() returns NUTS boundaries meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 26N, .e. NUTS area Central Eastern groups archipelago.

title: Azorean NUTS — nuts
code: nuts(crs = laea_azores_proj())  nuts_25N()  nuts_26N()

title: Azorean NUTS — nuts
text: crs Coordinate reference system (CRS) passed st_transform(). Defaults custom CRS centered Azores, see laea_azores_proj() details. possible options "EPSG: 3035" ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe "EPSG:4326" WGS 84.

title: Azorean NUTS — nuts
text: simple features (sf) object seven fields: nuts_code NUTS code. nuts_level NUTS level. nuts_name NUTS name. area NUTS area hectares (ha). perimeter NUTS perimeter kilometers. n_municipalities Number municipalities NUTS. n_parishes Number parishes NUTS.

title: Azorean civil administrative parishes — parishes
text: parishes() returns boundaries civil parishes Azores. parishes_25N() returns parishes meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 25N, .e. parishes western-part archipelago: Ilha das Flores Ilha Corvo. parishes_26N() returns parishes meter-based projection PTRA08 / UTM zone 26N, .e. parishes Central Eastern groups archipelago.

title: Azorean civil administrative parishes — parishes
code: parishes(crs = laea_azores_proj())  parishes_25N()  parishes_26N()

title: Azorean civil administrative parishes — parishes
text: crs Coordinate reference system (CRS) passed st_transform(). Defaults custom CRS centered Azores, see laea_azores_proj() details. possible options "EPSG: 3035" ETRS89-extended / LAEA Europe "EPSG:4326" WGS 84.

title: Azorean civil administrative parishes — parishes
text: simple features (sf) object six fields: id unique identifier parish. Follows format [DT][MN][FR]: DT two-digit id district, MN municipality FR parish (freguesia Portuguese). parish Name civil parish. municipality Name municipality. district Name district, coincides name island. area Parish area hectares (ha). perimeter Parish perimeter kilometers.

title: Get package name — pkg_name
text: pkg_name() returns package name.

title: Get package name — pkg_name
code: pkg_name()

title: Get package name — pkg_name
text: Package name character.
